rows.label: qev030901_MSG0001
rows.name: Happy news makes me want to share my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0002
rows.name: Hexuna Nebra is bearing my child![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0003
rows.name: Ha ha! I will finally be father![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_JNK0010
rows.name: Congratulate

rows.label: qev030901_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer Bazis a good word and a handshake.

rows.label: qev030901_JNK0020
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev030901_SEL0021
rows.name: Warn Bazis that he now has more to defend.

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thank you, Earth alien.
My child will be proud member of Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0005
rows.name: You are very serious, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0006
rows.name:
But yes. Ganglion will gladly harm child.
As father, I must grow stronger still.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0007
rows.name:
I cannot wait to see my child's face.
Stay strong and healthy, Hexuna Nebra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Bazis Wolfen! Terrible news!
Grandfather Auld Belgazus has collapsed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0009
rows.name:
Bazis. He... *sniff* He has lost final battle!
Graaaaaugh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Auld Belgazus is...dead? No. ...No!
He was so strong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0011
rows.name: Take me to him, Liana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0012
rows.name: He... *sob* He rests in open area below.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Earth alien! You helped Nemard with his rite of
marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0014
rows.name:
I ask you to join me.
I have request about Grandfather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0015
rows.name: Auld Belgazus rests now. He bears look of peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Nemard is wed now. Maybe this was what he waited
for. He always worried about that boy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev030901_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you're sure that Auld had no regrets at the end.

rows.label: qev030901_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev030901_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say it's a shame Auld did not live
to see the birth of Bazis's child.

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0017
rows.name:
Yes. He was excited at wedding.
More than I have seen in many suns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0018
rows.name:
Nemard was unreliable. He was weak.
But he gave much to Grandfather in end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0019
rows.name: I wish he could have seen his great-grandchild.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0020
rows.name: I also wish he could have seen his great-grandchild.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0021
rows.name: I wanted to make him happy. As Nemard did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Ah, that is right. I have request of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0023
rows.name:
Grandfather's funeral is soon. You helped with
Nemard's wedding. Will you help with this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0024
rows.name:
I want to do it myself. But I cannot.
I must stay close to Hexuna Nebra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0025
rows.name:
You must deliver Grandfather's soul to greatest of
all beasts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0026
rows.name:
Thank you. Speak to my father to know more.
He is Galba Vassago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0027
rows.name:
I will return to Hexuna Nebra.
Grandfather would be angry if I do not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0028
rows.name: Rgh. Hexuna is not well. This may be difficult birth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0029
rows.name:
Stay strong, Hexuna Nebra.
Spirit of Auld Belgazus is by your side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0030
rows.name:
She is here! My daughter is born!
My beautiful wife has given me girl![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0031
rows.name:
She refused to come out past head at first.
Doctor said she might not survive birth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0032
rows.name:
But Hexuna found surge of strength. Finished it.
Grandfather helped. I know it was him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev030901_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod and agree that Auld was looking out for them.

rows.label: qev030901_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev030901_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that Hexuna did it all herself.

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0033
rows.name: Thank you, Grandfather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0034
rows.name: Yes. Of course. She is so strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0035
rows.name:
She screamed like no beast I ever heard.
But she never stopped fighting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0036
rows.name:
And what of Grandfather?
Did you offer up his body to beast?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0037
rows.name: ...He became flesh of garuda jacul?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0038
rows.name: My daughter will inherit name fit for legend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0039
rows.name:
Children of Prone inherit name of closest soul that has
returned to beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0040
rows.name: Souls of departed and beast then watch over them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0041
rows.name:
Ha ha! My daughter has strongest great-grandfather
and fiercest beast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030901_MSG0042
rows.name:
I will raise Helna Jacul to be strongest of Prone.
This I swear.[ST:wait ]
